t: Amazon to open first brick-and-mortar storefront in Iowa at Jordan Creek Town Center
s: December 3, 2021 - Amazon, the massive e-commerce retailer based in Seattle, plans to open its first physical storefront in Iowa at Jordan Creek Town Center in West Des Moines.

t: Same-day delivery coming to central Iowa with new Amazon warehouse in Ankeny
s: December 5, 2024 - The company said in a news release it opened a new facility in Ankeny on Wednesday that will be capable of delivering a variety of items on the same day they're ordered to Amazon Prime customers within 50 miles. That's an area that includes the entire Des Moines and Ames metros.
